archimate:Principle.name: N-wise
archimate:Principle.documentation: A direct relationship between a limited number of entities, N, such that N is greater than 2, and such that the Identity of each party is understood in the same way by all participants. A doctor-patient-hospital relationship is N-wise, as is a nuclear family relationship among siblings. Compare with Pairwise and Anywise. See also Peering.
